Package org.radarbase.management.service

Class SourceService

java.lang.Object
org.radarbase.management.service.SourceService
@Service @Transactional public class SourceService extends Object
Service Implementation for managing Source.

    • safeUpdateOfAttributes

      public MinimalSourceDetailsDTO safeUpdateOfAttributes(Source sourceToUpdate, Map<String,String> attributes)
      This method does a safe update of source assigned to a subject. It will allow updates of attributes only.
      Parameters:
      sourceToUpdate - source fetched from database
      attributes - value to update
      Returns:
      Updated MinimalSourceDetailsDTO of source

    • updateSource

      @Transactional public Optional<SourceDTO> updateSource(SourceDTO sourceDto) throws org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
      Updates a source. Does not allow to transfer a source, if it is currently assigned. Does not allow to transfer if new project does not have valid source-type.
      Parameters:
      sourceDto - source details to update.
      Returns:
      updated source.
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
